2 Biggest Tuna Fish Brands in UK Backtracking on Commitments - Leaked documents show they're likely to opt out of commitments to end FAD fishing methods. 'That’s unacceptable. It's a truly devastating method of catching tuna. It catches a huge array of species, including sharks, rays & turtles.'
